actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the sharing of costs of undertaking multinational action in the Persian Gulf, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) any intervention in the Persian Gulf to protect the supply of oil to the free world should be multinational; (2) the President should inform each country which is a party with the United States to a mutual defense treaty or collective security agreement and which does not participate in such multinational action that such country will be assessed a proportionate share of the costs of such action; and (3) the President should consider specified factors with respect to such assessment of costs.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate regarding the sharing of costs of undertaking multinational action in the Persian Gulf, and for other purposes.
